abstract: Anaheim Ducks and right wing Chris Stewart agree to one-year contract worth $1.7 million.
lead_paragraph: Stewart, who agreed to a one-year deal with Anaheim, played for Buffalo and Minnesota last season, collecting 36 points and 88 penalty minutes.
snippet: Stewart, who agreed to a one-year deal with Anaheim, played for Buffalo and Minnesota last season, collecting 36 points and 88 penalty minutes.
